messages.C: Unrecognised escape sequence '\{0}'.  Treating as normal text.

messages.description: The octal value specified as \0nnn is larger than 255. {0} is value.
messages.C: Escape sequence \0{0:o} is greater than 255.  Ignoring it.

messages.description: The argument {0} ends with an unterminated escape sequence.
messages.C: Escape sequence is not finished at end of argument '{0}'.
